articles.title: Aggressive warming during surgery does not reduce major complications: Study - Times of India
articles.description: Patients kept at a body temperature of 37 C during major surgery had no fewer cardiac complications than patients kept at 35.5 C, according to the American College of Cardiology's researchers.This study was simultaneously published in the journal The Lancet. …
articles.content:

articles.author: Martin Boulton
articles.title: Kanye West creates a headache for Coachella with shock cancellation - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: West has followed up his non-appearance at the 64th Grammy Awards by pulling out of North America’s biggest festival.
articles.content:
Kanye West has pulled out of scheduled appearances at this months Coachella music festival, the largest in North America, a day after winning two Grammy Awards.

articles.content:
